title: So does anyone know if taliyah's Q or E will be nerfed to compensate for removin W's self silence?
body: I will be very depressed if it's her Q, please tell me its her E taking the hit.

replies.body: We'll definitely be nerfing the E, given the ability to W->E the change opens up (versus the riskier, harder to get as damaging a combo E->W). I suspect we'll have to cut more power somewhere else too though, she was already looking too strong before the W changes that will probably add noticeable power.

W>E is a stricly safer and better way to combo, but it's also less interesting thatn E>W. Couldn't you somehow nerf W>E without nerfing E>W so much? Something like E dealing less damage before it has "settled", in which case E>W would deal a bit more damage?

Your decision about buffing Q so early was a mistake in my opinion.It simply deals too much damage and i don't feel the drawback is good enough.
Also Rylai's needs a heavy nerf on the slow part because Taliyah is just dumb to play against after she gets it.Other mages get too much out of Rylai's slow too so she is not the only offender.
ah, okay. Thank you for answering my question!
